divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife, daughter, son and myself were sitting outside watching fireworks. I was starring off into the sky (eastward) when my wife asked what something was and pointed towards the west. I looked and it was a cross shaped UFO that was glowing red and orange. At first I figured it was a firework. It hovered for 3 or 4 minutes before moving around sporadically. It then faded away towards the west. We also noticed 3 + air planes flying towards where the UFO faded away. The only reason I'm reporting this is because so many other people seem to have seen the same thing. I posted this story on my Facebook account the night it happened.
